sentences.en: I have reviewed carefully the above information and hereby guarantee its correctness.
sentences.cn: 以上资料确由本人填写,并经详细检查,保证正确无误.

sentences.en: I hereby acknowledge receipt of your letter of 25 July.
sentences.cn: 特此告知贵方7月25日的来函收悉.

sentences.en: I hereby agree to the conditions of this contract.
sentences.cn: 我同意此合同的条款，特此声明。

sentences.en: I hereby declare John Henry elected.
sentences.cn: 我特此宣布约翰·亨利当选了.

sentences.en: If you want my family so badly , I hereby bequeath them to you.
sentences.cn: 我会双手奉上的,如果你想要我的家人的话.

sentences.en: It is hereby announced that there will be a talk on the international situation in the auditorium at 3 on Saturday afternoon.
sentences.cn: 定于星期六下午3点在礼堂举行国际形势报告会,特此通知.

sentences.en: Professor Eagleson called for the abolition of the Word " hereby ".
sentences.cn: 伊格里森教授主张废弃 “ 特此 ” 一词.

sentences.en: The public are hereby notified of it.
sentences.cn: 这事公众也由此接到了通知.

sentences.en: This proclamation is hereby issued in allsincerity and earnestness.
This proclamation is hereby issued with the full force of the law.
We hereby agree with the drawers , endorsers and bona fide holders of drafts.
sentences.cn: 我行在此向汇票的出票人,背书人及合法持有人表示同意.

sentences.en: We hereby revoke the agreement of January 1 st 1982.
sentences.cn: 我们特此宣告1982年1月1日的协议无效.

sentences.en: Words of mouth being no guarantee, a written statement is hereby given.
sentences.cn: 空口无凭, 立字为证.

sentences.en: You are hereby appointed Sub-Lieutenant RNVR of HMS Tartar.
sentences.cn: 你被任命为皇家海军舰艇“鞑靼人”号的皇家海军志愿后备队中尉。

sentences.en: Your advice is hereby earnestly solicited.

trans.tran_en: as a result of this statement – used in official situations
